body_html: I kind of fixed the error. My guess is that Hadoop only shows the initial file size as long as content is only appended to the event file and shows the "real" file size only when the training is stopped (ended or aborted). My problem further might have been related to the fact, that I have got Tensorflow running in a Docker container which was stopped immediately after Tensorflow was finished. I added some sleep at the end of my Python code, so that potential background operations have time to finish.
